name: The Collapse (BakenGamingStudios)
description:
A game about working "Together" made for the Mini Jame Gam 15.  Follow 2 miners as they use their trusty "shovels" to dig their way out of a terrible mine collapse.   Hurry and help them escape before the lava reaches them and burns them alive!

I ran out of time due to IRL commitments, but this serves as a proof of concept and I have never made this type of game, learned a lot!  Everything was made from scratch aside from some of the effects and the music.

**The mouse cursor was supposed to be a shovel, I fought it for over an hour and gave up because it would not build correctly
